thread.section_title: Beachcamera Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Beachcamera | www.beachcamera.com | 10 of 12
thread.title: gray

author: gray
title: gray
text: i saved money and got my item undamaged. the only thing i HATE is the shipping. according to my tracking i will receive it the seventh day then suddenly there`s a problem and cannot track order the next two days more then i can track again and not again. it`s so confusing and feel like i`m played. so for short, i am happy with my undamaged item and the money i saved. it`s just the shipping that makes me think to not buy here again due to uncomfortability i felt during the shipping. although i`m leaving this stars for them :)
